sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-row justify="center" class="h-full bg-white">
		<van-col span="24" class="flex flex-col">
			<van-nav-bar
				:left-text="$t('buttons.go_back')"
				@click-left="onClickLeft"
				left-arrow
			/>
			<van-cell-group class="w-full pt-4">
				<van-cell><AuthorizationButtons /></van-cell>
				<CheckBoxIOS v-if="theme" />
				<ItserveLanguagePicker />
				<van-cell
					is-link
					:title="$t('settings.questions')"
					:to="{ name: 'QuestionsView' }"
				/>
				<van-cell
					is-link
					:title="$t('terms_of_use.offer')"
					:to="{ name: 'OfferView' }"
				/>
				<van-cell
					is-link
					:title="$t('terms_of_use.policy')"
					:to="{ name: 'PolicyView' }"
				/>
			</van-cell-group>
		</van-col>
	</van-row>
</template>
<script setup>
import AuthorizationButtons from '@/components/template/AuthorizationButtons.vue';
import CheckBoxIOS from '@/components/content/CheckBoxIOS.vue';
import ItserveLanguagePicker from '@/components/forms/ItserveLanguagePicker.vue';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';
import { computed } from 'vue';
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';

const store = useStore();
const router = useRouter();

const theme = computed(() => store.state.Auth.nativeData.theme_mode);

function onClickLeft() {
	router.back();
}
</script>
<style></style>
